TopicTitle: The KSP Program Pt.1= Space rockets!

Articles.Content:
This a post that will chronical my space adventures. I only have the demo, our goal will be going to the Mun. Ill post info as soon as this is complete.

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Solid Fuel Rockets!

First, I bulit the RT10 rocket, a command pod with a RT10 booster attached. Not the best, but it will do.

We are lifting off in a moment
